data.comment: The big names in today's match at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Coventry with the kick-off.
An attacking Blackburn player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 14, Michael Rose (Coventry) has been sent off!
Adam Armstrong converts the penalty to give Blackburn a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 20, Barry Douglas (Blackburn) gets a yellow card.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Blackburn kick-off.
In the minute 49, It's now 0-2 in Birmingham as Adam Armstrong scores for Blackburn.
Adam Armstrong (Blackburn) has received a first yellow card.
Maxime Biamou is replacing Matt Godden for the home team.
In the minute 61, The away team replace Barry Douglas with Amari Bell.
Mark Robins is making the team's second substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Josh Pask replacing Sam McCallum.
Goal! Blackburn extend their lead to 0-3 through Harvey Elliott.
In the minute 64, Sam Gallagher is replacing Adam Armstrong for Blackburn at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a second substitution, with John Buckley replacing Tom Trybull.
Ben Sheaf is booked for the home team.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Callum O`Hare with Gervane Kastaneer. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Robins.
Goal! Sam Gallagher extends Blackburn's lead to 0-4.
The match has come to a close in Birmingham. The final score is 0-4.
